statements.select: select C_CARNAME, C_TAREWEIGHT, C_CREATETIME, C_SITENO, C_RESERV1, C_RESERV2 from sm_gcztare_info where C_CREATETIME between to_date(#StartTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#EndTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and C_CARNAME = '$carNo$' order by C_CREATETIME desc
select C_CARNAME, C_TAREWEIGHT, C_CREATETIME, C_SITENO, C_RESERV1, C_RESERV2 from sm_gcztare_info where C_CARNAME = #C_CARNAME# order by C_CREATETIME desc

select C_CARNAME, C_TAREWEIGHT, C_CREATETIME, C_SITENO, C_RESERV1, C_RESERV2 from sm_gcztare_info where C_CREATETIME between to_date(#startTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and C_RESERV1 is not null
C_CARNAME = #carName#
C_SITENO = #siteNo#
order by C_CREATETIME asc
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SM_GCZTARE_INFO WHERE C_CARNAME = #C_CARNAME# AND C_TAREWEIGHT !=0 ORDER BY C_CREATETIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM != 4

select C_CARNAME, C_TAREWEIGHT, C_CREATETIME, C_SITENO, C_RESERV1, C_RESERV2 from sm_gcztare_info where C_RESERV1 is not null and C_RESERV1 != '\' and C_TAREWEIGHT > 0
C_CREATETIME between to_date(#startTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
C_CARNAME = #carName#
C_SITENO = #siteNo#
order by C_CREATETIME desc
